  • class hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer

class hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer¶

Overview¶

Renderer used for rendering cogs::Frustum. More…

#include <FrustumRenderer.h>

class FrustumRenderer: public hiro::draw::Renderer {
public:
    // construction

    FrustumRenderer();
    FrustumRenderer(const cogs::Frustum& frustum);
    FrustumRenderer(const hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer&);
    FrustumRenderer(hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer&&);
    virtual ~FrustumRenderer();

    // methods

    FrustumRenderer& operator=(const hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer&);
    FrustumRenderer& operator=(hiro::draw::FrustumRenderer&&);
    void SetFrustum(const cogs::Frustum& frustum);
    virtual bool IsCompatibileWithStyle(const hiro::draw::Style* style);

protected:
    // methods

    virtual void OnRenderSimple();
};

Inherited Members¶

public:
    // methods

    virtual bool IsCompatibileWithStyle(const hiro::draw::Style* style) = 0;

protected:
    // methods

    virtual void LoadRequiredShaderPrograms(glw::ProgramList* programs);
    virtual void Render(const std::string& program);
    virtual void OnRenderSimple();
    virtual void Render2D(const std::string& program);
    virtual void OnRenderSimple2D();
    virtual void FillTextRenderer(hiro::draw::TextRenderer* t_renderer);

    template <typename StyleType>
    const StyleType* GetStyle() const;

    const Scene* GetScene() const;

Detailed Documentation¶

Renderer used for rendering cogs::Frustum.

Construction¶

FrustumRenderer()

Creates a renderer without a frustum defined.

FrustumRenderer(const cogs::Frustum& frustum)

Creates a renderer with the specified frustum.

Methods¶

void SetFrustum(const cogs::Frustum& frustum)

Replace the currently used frustum with a new one.

virtual bool IsCompatibileWithStyle(const hiro::draw::Style* style)

Test whether specified style is compatible with the object.

virtual void OnRenderSimple()

Specifies what happens when simple rendering is performed.
